author: BEN
title: Learn and Earn: Developer Training
description: The learning curve for newcomers in the Cardano Development Ecosystem is too steep. This poses a barrier to developer adoption.
solution: We soften the developer learning curve by providing instructional training with ADA incentives, through our Learn and Earn program.
experience: We at the Blockchain Education Network have over 7 years of experience in Blockchain Education. https://blockchainedu.org/.
